project.name: fonts
project.author: Donnie Berkholz
project.description: The fonts herd maintains fonts packages in Portage.

longdescription.p: The fonts herd maintains fonts packages in Portage. These largely reside in the media-fonts category. Some of the packages also have secondary maintainers, such as the gnome herd, because they are part of the core of another package.

body.p: If you want to get involved with improving Gentoo's font experience, we'd like to hear from you! The main thing you'll want to do is be active on Gentoo's Bugzilla. Also please join desktop project members in #gentoo-desktop on irc.freenode.net.
